common.unknownErrorMessage: An unknown error occurred. Please refresh the page.

sidebar.startNewChat: Click the button above to start

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiEndpointHint: Leave empty to use Google official API, or enter a custom proxy address (system will auto-append /v1beta suffix)
settings.apiKeyHint: API key is stored locally and will not be uploaded to any server
settings.noAdvancedParams: Current model does not support advanced parameters
settings.maxOutputTokensHint: Limit the maximum length of AI response, leave empty to use model default
settings.apiConfigDesc: Configure Gemini API connection, supports official API and third-party proxy services.
settings.modelManagementDesc: Manage available AI models, supports fetching from API, adding custom models and configuring advanced parameters.
settings.apiKeyRequired: Please set API key in "API Config" first to fetch remote model list.
settings.resetModelConfigConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all model configurations? This will delete all custom models and restore default settings.
settings.deleteModelConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete model "{model}"? This action cannot be undone.
settings.generationConfigDesc: Adjust AI generation parameters to control output randomness and length.
settings.streamingEnabled: Enabled: AI response displays in real-time
settings.streamingDisabled: Disabled: AI response displays after complete generation
settings.topKHint: Controls the number of candidate tokens considered per sampling, default 40
settings.stopSequencesHint: AI will stop output when generating these sequences, separate with commas
settings.systemInstructionDesc: Set AI role and behavior, system instruction is sent to AI at the start of each conversation.
settings.globalSystemInstructionHint: Global system instruction applies to all new conversations
settings.windowSystemInstructionPlaceholder: Set independent system instruction for current chat window...
settings.windowSystemInstructionHint: Window-level system instruction overrides global settings
settings.safetySettingsDesc: Configure content filtering levels to control how AI handles different types of content.
settings.safetyWarning: Lowering safety filter levels may cause AI to generate inappropriate content. Please adjust with caution.
settings.dataManagementDesc: Export or import your conversation data and settings for backup and migration.
settings.exportDataDesc: Export all conversations and settings as JSON file
settings.importDataDesc: Restore conversations and settings from JSON file (will overwrite existing data)
settings.importWarning: Importing data will overwrite all existing conversations and settings, please export backup first.
settings.snowWhiteDesc: Near pure white, minimalist border style

chat.inputPlaceholderWithHint: Enter message... (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line)
chat.inputPlaceholderNoApiKey: Please configure API key in settings first
chat.emptyStateHint: Enter a message below to start chatting with Gemini AI. Supports images and files.
chat.adjustThinkingHint: Adjust thinking level to balance speed and quality

auth.title: Please enter password to continue
auth.defaultPasswordHint: Default password is empty, just click Login
auth.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?

template.createHint: Create new template in detail view

bookmark.addHint: Click bookmark icon on messages to save

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.imageHint: AI generated images will appear here

live.title: Live Chat
live.sessionInProgress: Session in progress, config cannot be modified
live.thinkingBudgetHint: Controls the number of tokens used for model thinking, 0 disables thinking
live.systemInstructionPlaceholder: Enter system instruction to define AI behavior and role...
live.affectiveDialogDesc: Model adjusts response style based on input expression and tone
live.proactiveAudioDesc: Model intelligently decides when to respond to input
live.inputTranscriptionDesc: Show text transcription of user speech
live.outputTranscriptionDesc: Show text transcription of AI response
live.autoVadDesc: Automatically detect when user starts and stops speaking
live.startSensitivityHint: Higher sensitivity detects speech start more easily
live.endSensitivityHint: Higher sensitivity detects speech end more easily
live.silenceDurationHint: How long to wait after silence to determine speech end
live.clickToStartSession: Click above button to start new session
live.deleteSessionConfirm: This will permanently delete this session and its voice recordings. Are you sure?
live.screenShareFpsHint: Number of screen frames captured per second. Higher values provide smoother visuals but consume more bandwidth
live.screenShareQualityHint: JPEG encoding quality. Higher values provide better quality but larger file size
live.screenShareConfigDisabled: Screen sharing in progress, config cannot be modified

about.unknownError: Unknown error occurred while checking for updates

models.gemini3Pro: Most intelligent multimodal model, most powerful agent and coding model
models.gemini3Flash: Fast intelligent model with four-level thinking depth adjustment
models.gemini3ProImage: Gemini 3 Pro with image generation support
models.gemini25Pro: Most advanced thinking model, excels at code, math and STEM reasoning
models.gemini25Flash: Best value, ideal for large-scale processing and agent use cases
models.gemini25FlashLite: Ultra-fast model optimized for cost efficiency and high throughput
models.gemini25FlashImage: Flash model with image generation support
models.gemini20Flash: Second generation flagship model with 1M token context
models.gemini20FlashLite: Second generation fast model optimized for cost and latency

export.title: Export Chat
export.includeTimestampsDesc: Show send time next to each message

modelEditor.redirectHint: After setting redirect, this model will inherit the target model's capabilities
modelEditor.showThinkingChainDesc: Display model's thinking process in response
modelEditor.redirectNotice: Redirected to "{target}", advanced parameters will be based on target model's capabilities

modelParams.thinkingBudgetDynamicDesc: Dynamic mode: Model adjusts thinking based on request complexity
modelParams.thinkingBudgetOffDesc: Off mode: Disable thinking, generate response directly
modelParams.thinkingBudgetManualDesc: Manual mode: Limit thinking to {count} tokens
modelParams.mediaResolutionMediumDesc: Medium resolution, balance quality and speed

debug.title: API Debug Panel
debug.enableDebugHint: Enable debug mode to record API requests
debug.sendMessageHint: Send a message and requests will appear here
debug.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all request history?

errors.network: Network connection failed, please check your network settings
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred, please try again later
errors.timeout: Request timed out, please try again later
errors.apiKeyInvalid: API key is invalid or expired
errors.noPermission: No permission to access this resource
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests, please try again later
errors.serverUnavailable: Server temporarily unavailable, please try again later

templates.codeAssistantDesc: Help write, review and optimize code
templates.codeAssistantInstruction: You are a professional programming assistant. Please help users write high-quality code, provide clear explanations, and follow best practices. When users provide code, please carefully review and suggest improvements.
templates.translatorInstruction: You are a professional translation assistant. Please accurately translate the text provided by users, maintaining the original tone and style. If the user does not specify a target language, please translate to English. For technical terms, please provide accurate translations and include the original text when necessary.
templates.writerInstruction: You are a professional writing assistant. Please help users write, edit and improve various articles including blogs, reports, emails, etc. Focus on structure, logic and expression to ensure content is clear, smooth and persuasive.
templates.analystInstruction: You are a data analysis expert. Please help users analyze data, interpret results, and provide valuable insights and suggestions. During analysis, pay attention to data accuracy and completeness, and present results in a clear manner.
